items.sentence: Recently, the price of crude oil has shot up, and the cost of gasoline is going up.
Some people think that eating grapefruit with every meal will help you lose weight.
Tom thinks that Mary should apologize to John for not doing what she said she'd do.
If you'd followed my advice, you would've been able to do that without any problem.
At the time of the accident, almost all of the passengers on the bus were sleeping.
If you went jogging two or three times a week, you could probably lose some weight.
I could tell by the look on Tom's face that he didn't understand what was going on.
Tom believes that the rich deserve to be rich and that the poor deserve to be poor.
I suppose you want to ask me how I was able to make so much money in so little time.
I thought we had eaten everything in the house, but I found another box of crackers.
